How the collaboration works
Initial consultation
First, we will get in touch and clarify your needs and goals. I share my experience and you decide whether the collaboration makes sense for both sides.
Plan and price estimate
Together we will create a timeline, on which the price depends. For larger IT projects, it is impossible to estimate everything precisely, so I always provide a percentage of uncertainty and keep you informed regularly – at least once a week – about the progress.
Transparent development
All work is documented with source code (GIT), which becomes your property upon completion and allows for ongoing oversight by a third party.
Project scope
I focus on larger projects with a duration measured in months. Smaller tasks (e.g., simple company applications) are priced individually, otherwise I use the following hourly rates depending on the type of activity.
{hr()}
